Detailed Description

Page composer.

Note:
There must be only one template per page, but each page may has each own template.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 30 of file page_composer.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->TemplateName = $PageDescription[ 'template' ];
                        $this->TemplateVersion = $PageDescription[ 'template_version' ];
                        
                        $this->Template = $this->TemplateManager->get_template( 
                              $PageDescription[ 'template' ] , $PageDescription[ 'template_version' ]
                        );

                        $this->set_page_title( $PageDescription[ 'title' ] );

                        $this->Packages = $this->PageComposerUtilities->get_package_appliance( 
                              $Page , $PageName , $PageDescription[ 'options' ]
                        );

                        $this->Layout = $Settings->get_setting( 'layout' , 'default' );

generation_loop ( &$  Page,
$  PageName,
$  PageDescription 
)

Function generates page.

Parameters:
$Page - Page object.
$PageName - Name of the composing page.
$PageDescription - Page description.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 651 of file page_composer.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->PageComposerUtilities->execute_generators( 
                              $this->Packages , 'pre_generation' , $this->Template
                        );
                              
                        $String = $this->Template->get_template();

                        $String = $this->execute_processors( $String , 'pre_process' );
                        $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $Settings->load_settings( $PageDescription[ 'options' ] );
                        $String = $this->String->print_record( $String , $Settings->get_raw_settings() );
                        $this->Template->set_template( $String );

                        $this->Template->process( $PageName );
                        $this->process_direct_controllers();
                        $this->PageComposerUtilities->process_controllers( $this->Packages );
                        $this->PageComposerUtilities->process_views( $this->Packages , $this->Template );

                        $this->process_direct_views();
                        
                        $String = $this->Template->get_template();
                        $String = $this->execute_processors( $String , 'post_process' );
                        $this->Template->set_template( $String );

                        $this->PageComposerUtilities->execute_generators(
                              $this->Packages , 'post_generation' , $this->Template
                        );
                        
                        $this->output_trace_if_necessary();
                        
                        /* \~russian зачищаем шаблон от служебной разметки
                           \~english clean up template */
                        $this->Template->cleanup( $PageName , $PageDescription[ 'options' ] );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

get_page ( $  PageName  ) 

Function starts page composition.

Parameters:
$PageName - Name of the composing page.
Returns:
HTML code of the composed page.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 716 of file page_composer.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $PageDescription = $this->prepare_page_generation( $PageName );
                        
                        if( $PageDescription !== false )
                        {
                              $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:page_generation_start} : $PageName" , COMMON );
                              $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:fetching_data} : $PageName" , COMMON );
                              $this->fetch_page_data( $this->PageAccess , $PageName , $PageDescription );

                              $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:run_generation_loop} : $PageName" , COMMON );
                              $this->generation_loop( $this->PageAccess , $PageName , $PageDescription );

                              return( $this->Template->get_template() );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:requested_page_was_not_found} : $PageName" , ERROR );
                              
                              return( $this->get_page( '404' ) );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

output_trace_if_necessary (  ) 

Function outputs trace if necessary.

Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 596 of file page_composer.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'trace' , 'integer' , 0 ) )
                        {
                              $String = $this->Template->get_template();
                              $String = str_replace( '{trace}' , $this->Trace->compile_trace() , $String );
                              $String = $this->PageComposerUtilities->execute_processors( 
                                    $this->Packages , $String , 'post_process'
                              );
                              $this->Template->set_template( $String );
                        }
                        elseif( $this->Security->get_gp( 'trace_only' , 'integer' , 0 ) )
                        {
                              $String = $this->Trace->compile_trace();
                              $String = $this->PageComposerUtilities->execute_processors(
                                    $this->Packages , $String , 'post_process'
                              );
                              print( $String );
                              exit( 0 );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

pre_process ( $  Options,
$  Str,
&$  Changed 
)

Function preprocesses forms and controls.

Parameters:
$Options - Options of drawing.
$Str - Postprocessing string.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
HTML code to display.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 943 of file page_composer.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $PageName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'page_name' , 'command' );
                        
                        $ContentSpecification = $this->String->block_exists(
                              $Str , 'page:'.$PageName , 'page:~'.$PageName
                        );
                        
                        if( $ContentSpecification )
                        {
                              $Str = $this->String->show_block(
                                    $Str , 'page:'.$PageName , 'page:~'.$PageName , $Changed
                              );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $Str = $this->String->show_block(
                                    $Str , 'page:default' , 'page:~default' , $Changed
                              );
                        }

                        if( $this->String->block_exists( $Str , 'layout' ) )
                        {
                              $Str = str_replace( '{layout}' , '{include:'.$this->Layout.'}' , $Str );
                        }
                        
                        do
                        {
                              $PlaceHolders = array();
                              preg_match( '/\{page:([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)\}/' , $Str , $PlaceHolders );
                              
                              if( count( $PlaceHolders ) > 1 )
                              {
                                    $Str = $this->String->hide_block(
                                          $Str , 'page:'.$PlaceHolders[ 1 ] , 'page:~'.$PlaceHolders[ 1 ] , $Changed
                                    );
                              }
                        }
                        while( count( $PlaceHolders ) > 1 );
                        
                        return( $Str );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 457 of file page_composer.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( GZIP_TRAFFIC )
                        {
                              @ob_start( 'ob_gzhandler' , 9 );
                        }

                        $this->process_success_message();
                        
                        $PageDescription = $this->PageAccess->get_page_description( $PageName );
                        
                        if( $PageDescription[ 'template' ] == 'default' )
                        {
                              $this->Template = $this->TemplateManager->get_default_template_name();
                        }
                        elseif( $PageDescription[ 'template' ] == 'default_admin' )
                        {
                              $this->Template = $this->TemplateManager->get_default_admin_template_name();
                        }
                        $PageDescription[ 'template' ] = $this->Template[ 'name' ];
                        $PageDescription[ 'template_version' ] = $this->Template[ 'version' ];
                        
                        return( $PageDescription );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {

Definition at line 1188 of file page_composer.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( is_array( $this->ErrorMessages ) && count( $this->ErrorMessages ) )
                        {
                              $StartingDiv = '<table class="error message_corner_all"><tr><td>'.
                                                            '<div class="aligned_message_white">';
                              $ClosingDiv = '</div></td></tr></table><br>';
                              $Str = str_replace( 
                                    '{error_message}' , $StartingDiv.'{lang:'.implode( '}'.$ClosingDiv.
                                    $StartingDiv.'{lang:' , $this->ErrorMessages ).'}'.$ClosingDiv , $Str
                              );
                              $this->ErrorMessages = array();
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        if( is_array( $this->SuccessMessages ) && count( $this->SuccessMessages ) )
                        {
                              $StartingDiv = '<table class="success message_corner_all"><tr><td>'.
                                                            '<div class="aligned_message_black">';
                              $ClosingDiv = '</div></td></tr></table><br>';
                              $Str = str_replace( 
                                    '{success_message}' , $StartingDiv.'{lang:'.implode( '}'.$ClosingDiv.
                                    $StartingDiv.'{lang:' , $this->SuccessMessages ).'}'.$ClosingDiv , $Str
                              );
                              $this->SuccessMessages = array();
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( strpos( $Str , '{page_name}' ) !== false )
                        {
                              $Str = str_replace( '{page_name}' , $this->Security->get_gp( 'page_name' , 'string' ) , $Str );
                        }
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'meta' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_setting(
                                    'package_version' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' )
                              );

                              $MetaFile = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 
                                    $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) , 
                                    $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' ) 
                              ).'/meta/'.$this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );

                              $MetaSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

                              $MetaSettings->load_file( $MetaFile );
                              
                              $MetaSettings->set_setting( 'package_name' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) );
                              $MetaSettings->set_setting( 
                                    'package_version' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' )
                              );
                              
                              if( $MetaSettings->get_setting( 'controller' , '0' ) != '0' )
                              {
                                    $Str = str_replace(
                                          "{meta:$Parameters}" , '{direct_controller:'.$MetaSettings->get_all_settings().'}' , 
                                          $Str
                                    );
                              }
                              elseif( $MetaSettings->get_setting( 'view' , '0' ) != '0' )
                              {
                                    $Str = str_replace(
                                          "{meta:$Parameters}" , '{direct_view:'.$MetaSettings->get_all_settings().'}' , 
                                          $Str
                                    );
                              }
                              elseif( $MetaSettings->get_setting( 'post_process' , '0' ) != '0' )
                              {
                                    $Str = $this->execute_processors( $Str , 'post_process' );
                                    $Str = str_replace( "{meta:$Parameters}" , '' , $Str );
                              }

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->PageMarkup->process_direct_view( $Str , $Changed );

                        list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->PageMarkup->process_direct_controller( $Str , $Changed );
                        
                        return( $Str );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

                              $this->Security->unset_s( 'success_message' );

                              $this->Security->unset_s( "$PageName:success_message" );
                        }
                  }
